item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Friday, November 8, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. XMPP: The Forgotten Gem of Instant Messaging (30 points | 33 comments)

3. CORAL: a Rust-like Borrow Checker for C (13 points | 2 comments)

9. Ysco - managed automated updates for Go services (4 points | no comments)
10. FreeBSD 2024 Q3 Status Report (14 points | 2 comments)
11. PYLINGUAL: Toward Perfect Decompilation of Evolving High-Level Languages (4 points | 1 comment)
12. Proposal for a Django project template (7 points | 6 comments)
13. determination: Rust typecheckers for System F and System F-omega (3 points | 2 comments)
14. I'm not mutable, I'm partially instantiated (3 points | no comments)
15. peer to peer but mostly the main peer (2022) (16 points | 3 comments)
16. Bringing faster exceptions to Rust (2 points | 1 comment)

18. Yellow Scream (2024) (11 points | no comments)
19. How to Learn: Userland Disk I/O (24 points | 7 comments)

21. Clojure in live sports television (Clojure Conj 2024) (1 points | 1 comment)

23. How WebSockets cost us $1M on our AWS bill (22 points | 5 comments)
24. A Science of Concurrent Programs (15 points | 1 comment)
25. Sanitize Client-Side: Why Server-Side HTML Sanitization is Doomed to Fail (3 points | 14 comments)
